full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thank you for updating this.

Best regards,

Talostone have three ranges: https://talostone.com.au/collections
Talostone® Minq® Zero - Mineral Surfaces (formerly engineered)
Talostone® Artsense® - Sintered Stone
Talostone® Natroccia® - Natural Stone
For samples please order at our website: https://talostone.com.au/samples
For slab purchases/orders: orders@talostone.com.au



Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu



tien@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Hope you are well.
Can you please fix the following issue on our qwebsite:
Link: https://talostone.com.au/stone-surfaces-gallery/premium-marble-range

The Natroccia and Artsense range are underneath the MinQ Zero premium marble range.
Can you please remove these two and have it on their own tabs, thank you.

Best regards,
